title: Full Stack Developer - 42 Rio
description: Full stack developer experience in the 42 Labs program was essential for my growth, giving me direct contact with real problems from partner companies. Through this program I improved my hard skills in software development and strengthened soft skills while solving complex problems. Working on challenges that directly impact businesses and jobs was a crucial step in my career, preparing me for the software engineering and full stack web development market.

title: Full Stack Developer - Freelancer
description: My experience includes developing real web projects for global clients. Beyond implementation, I was responsible for the design of these solutions, which received positive feedback. This gave me a solid front-end foundation and the ability to deliver attractive, functional designs for any full stack project.
